item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

syipker is attacking my server? anyone have an auto ban method for the username?

also

ya im trying to add a 25 wave jad minigame to my server… and i need the code were when a npc dies they tele the player or a new npc is summond, if a new npc is summoned is there a way were only 1 person would get to see that npc and not be able to see other people that are doing the fight caves?
this code would greatly be appriciated.
when i get this working i will release into tuturial section.
thank you for vewing!
~red_rooster

i tried adding something similar the highya scape v2 godsword minigame, no erres compiled fine but when i kill the first monster i get this

-NoobScape-
Server Online
